name: Stock Forecasting
content:
Stock Forecasting


Algorithm: Facebook Prophet

  • Prophet is an open-source forecasting library developed by Facebook.
  • Designed for time series with strong seasonality and trend components.
  • Decomposes data into Trend + Seasonality + Holidays/Events for accurate, interpretable forecasting.
  • Handles missing values and outliers automatically.


Methodology

1.Historical Data Preparation

  • Collect timestamp and closing price data.
  • Clean and reformat for Prophet (ds = date, y = target variable / Close price).

2.Model Training

  • Fit Prophet model on historical closing prices.
  • Learn underlying trends, cycles, and seasonality.

3.Forecasting

  • Specify forecasting horizon (e.g., 30, 60, or 90 days).
  • Generate future predictions with uncertainty intervals.

4.Evaluation

  • Compare forecasted vs actual prices on a holdout/test period.
  • Use MAPE (Mean Absolute Percentage Error) to evaluate accuracy.

5.Visualization

  • Prophet provides built-in plots to:
  • Overlay forecast vs historical data.
  • Display uncertainty bands.
  • Break down trend and seasonality effects.


Insights & Applications

  • Provides short- to medium-term price forecasts.
  • Helps investors identify potential upward/downward trends.
  • Supports risk management by anticipating volatility shifts.
  • Enhances portfolio planning with data-driven foresight.
